column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////The pistachio croissant was amazing as always
column2: but both of our actual dishes were bummers. The quiche didn't seem to have the right consistency and the side salad was completely overdressed. The tamales had a tough/strange filling and the side sauce was oddly tangy. Everything was still good enough of course
column3: but not at the level of excellence that we had come to expect from this place.
